channel.title: Radix Logical Moon (New Status Monitor)
channel.description:
In an effort to ensure Radix Logical Moon continue to offer our stakers the best service and remain transparent, we are pleased to announce a new update to our website for you to track the status of our validator node and useful metrics for the wider network (https://radixlogicalmoon.com/status/). This is the first of a few updates we will be making to our website. As always we welcome your feedback
![Logical Moon Status Page|690x462](upload://qdjDcuf4j0Ckh6SvFAql0YvG9iW.png)

item.title: Radix Logical Moon (New Status Monitor)

item.description:
In an effort to ensure Radix Logical Moon continue to offer our stakers the best service and remain transparent, we are pleased to announce a new update to our website for you to track the status of our validator node and useful metrics for the wider network (Status). This is the first of a few updates we will be making to our website. As always we welcome your feedback
